content.question: Which of the following describes a surplus in the government budget?

choices.label: Private savings exceed private investment spending.
Private savings exceed government purchases plus transfer payments.
Tax revenues exceed government purchases plus transfer payments.
National debt exceeds government purchases plus transfer payments.

content.answer: Tax revenues exceed government purchases plus transfer payments.
